description.name: Spring handle chipping hammer 300g
description.long_desc:
The 300g welding hammer with a spring handle is a tool that will meet the expectations of even the most demanding welders.


Here's why it's worth choosing:



  • 300-gram weight: A lightweight and handy hammer weighing 300 grams provides comfort during work. It doesn't overly strain your hand, yet it's solid enough to meet welding requirements.

  • Ideal for cleaning welds: Sometimes welds are covered with slag or produce spatter. This hammer excels at removing these impurities, ensuring clean and durable welds.

  • Spring handle: The handle equipped with a spring reduces vibrations that can occur during strikes. This means you can work comfortably and efficiently, without excessive strain on your joints.

  • Versatility: The hammer has two sides: one is flat, resembling a chisel, perfect for cleaning welds on flat surfaces, and the other is a point, allowing for more precise strikes.

description.name: Air Pressure Regulator with Water Separator Filter 1/4"
description.long_desc:
An air dehydrator with an air filter and regulator equipped with a standard 1/4" air inlet connection. The device is designed to purify incoming air from most liquid and solid particles. It features a pressure regulator that allows for smooth adjustment of the outlet air pressure ranging from 0 to 150 PSI.


Product characteristics:



  • Designed to purify air from most liquid and solid particles.

  • Pressure regulator enables setting the outlet pressure in the range from 0 to 150 PSI.

  • Equipped with a standard air inlet connection.

description.name: Waterproof bicycle light set USB IPX4 – front light 800lm + rear light 120lm
description.long_desc:
The set of front and rear bike lights is an excellent solution for every cyclist who cares about safety on the road and comfort when riding after dark.


Here's why you should choose this light:



  • The front light is made of aluminum, equipped with two 10W COB LED chips, providing bright and clear light with an intensity of 800 lumens.

  • The 900mAh battery allows for long working hours - 4-5 hours on a single charge (depending on the selected mode).

  • The waterproof design ensures reliability in various weather conditions.

  • Six operating modes for the front light: left LED 100%, left LED 70%, right LED 100%, both LEDs, pulsating, strobe.

  • The rear light has 5 COB LED chips that can operate in 4 modes: steady light, flashing light, pulsating light, fast flashing light.

  • The built-in 120mAh battery ensures reliability on the road.

  • Quick installation and removal, as well as compact dimensions, allow you to mount the set on your bike in no time, and in case of leaving your bike in a public place, you can easily remove the lights to avoid potential theft.

  • The set includes two micro-USB cables for charging the lights.


Technical specifications:


Housing material: aluminum, ABS plastic


Mounting: quick - rubber strap / O-rings (18-34mm)


Set contents: front + rear light, 2x micro USB cable


Front light


Light source: 2x COB LED chip


Power: 10W


Lighting modes: left LED 100%, left LED 70%, right LED 100%, both LEDs, pulsating, strobe


Battery: 900mAh


Working time: 4-5 hours


Charging time: 2-3 hours


Battery charge indicator: yes


Waterproof: yes, IPx4


Rear light


Light source: 5x COB LED chip


Light angle: 240°


Lighting modes: steady light, flashing light, pulsating light, fast flashing light


Battery: 120mAh


Waterproof: yes, IPx4

description.name: Waterproof bicycle light set USB IPX4
description.long_desc:
The set of bike lights for front and rear is an excellent solution for every cyclist who cares about safety on the road and comfort while riding after dark.


Here's why choosing this light is worth it:



  • The front light is equipped with two LH351B LED diodes, providing bright and clear illumination. A 350mAh battery allows for long-lasting operation – from 3 to 12 hours on a single charge (depending on the selected mode).

  • Waterproof construction ensures reliability in various weather conditions.

  • Three working modes for the front light: strong light, medium light, gentle light.

  • The rear light features 14 COB LED diodes, which can operate in 6 modes: strong light, medium light, gentle light, pulsating light, fast pulsating, very fast pulsating.

  • A built-in 230mAh battery ensures reliability on the road.

  • Quick installation and removal, along with compact dimensions, allow you to mount the set on your bike quickly, and in case of leaving your bike in a public place, you can easily remove the lights to prevent potential theft.

  • The set includes two micro-USB cables for charging the lights.


Technical specifications:


Housing material: ABS plastic


Mounting: Quick – rubber strap (18-34mm)


Set contents: front + rear light, 2x micro USB cable


Front Light


Light source: 2x LH351B LED diode


Light modes: strong light, medium light, gentle light


Battery: 350mAh


Operating time: 3-12 hours


Charging time: 1 hour


Waterproof: Yes, IPx4


Rear Light


Light source: 14x COB LED diode


Light modes: strong light, medium light, gentle light, pulsating light, fast pulsating, very fast pulsating


Battery: 230mAh


Waterproof: Yes, IPx4

description.name: Waterproof bicycle light set USB IP54
description.long_desc:
The set of bike lights for front and rear is an excellent solution for every cyclist who values safety on the road and comfort while riding after dark.


Here's why choosing this light is worth it:



  • The front light is equipped with a CREE LED, providing bright and clear illumination.

  • A 900mAh 3.7V battery allows for long-lasting operation – from 4 to 6 hours on a single charge.

  • Waterproof construction ensures reliability in various weather conditions.

  • Three working modes for the front light: strong light, gentle light, and flashing light.

  • The rear light features 5 COB LEDs with a wide 240° beam angle, making you visible from every side.

  • A built-in 400mAh battery ensures reliability on the road.

  • Quick installation and removal, along with compact dimensions, allow you to mount the set on your bike quickly, and in case of leaving your bike in a public place, you can easily remove the lights to prevent potential theft.

  • The set includes two micro-USB cables for charging the lights.

Front Light

Battery: 900mAh 3.7V


Operating time: 4-6 hours


Charging time: 2 hours


Waterproof: Yes, IP54


Rear Light


Light source: 5x COB LED


Luminous power: 120 lumens


Beam angle: 240°


Battery: 400mAh


Waterproof: Yes

description.name: Adjustable bicycle kickstand
description.long_desc:
The adjustable bike center stand is the perfect solution for any cycling enthusiast. Made of durable aluminum, it's resistant to weather conditions. An additional advantage is its universality, as the adjustable feature allows it to fit bikes equipped with wheels ranging from 24” to 29” in diameter.


Why choose it:



  • High-Quality Aluminum: Our stand is made of durable aluminum, ensuring not only lightweight construction but also durability.

  • Central Mounting: Easy and quick central mounting provides stability and balance when parking your bike, regardless of the type of bike you own.

  • Length Adjustment: Our stand fits various types of bikes with wheel diameters from 24" to 29".


Technical specifications:


Material: aluminum


Intended use: universal


Wheel diameter: 24”-29”

description.name: Aluminum bicycle bottle holder + mounting screws
description.long_desc:
The bike bottle holder is a reliable companion for every cyclist. With it, you'll always have your favorite drink at hand.


Here's why you should choose it:



  • Standard size: The holder is designed for bottles and containers with a diameter of approximately 8cm.

  • Durability: Made of durable aluminum, it's resistant to corrosion and various weather conditions. Whether you're riding in the sun, rain, or winter, the holder will serve you for a long time.

  • Easy installation: The set includes two mounting screws, allowing you to easily attach the holder to your bike.


Technical specifications:


Material: aluminum


Supported bottle/container diameter: approximately 8cm


Additional information: two mounting screws included

description.name: Adjustable bicycle water bottle holder + mounting screws
description.long_desc:
The adjustable bike bottle holder is a reliable companion for every cyclist. With it, you'll always have your favorite drink at hand.


Here's why you should choose it:


Size adjustment: With its adjustable feature, you can easily fit your bottle or place a bottle of your favorite drink in it. It accommodates bottles and containers with a diameter ranging from 4.5cm to 7.5cm.


Durability: Made of durable plastic, it's resistant to cracking and various weather conditions. Whether you're riding in the sun, rain, or winter, the holder will serve you for a long time.


Easy installation: The set includes two mounting screws, allowing you to easily attach the holder to your bike.


Technical specifications:


Material: durable plastic


Supported bottle/container diameter: 4.5-7.5 cm


Additional information: two mounting screws included

description.name: Bicycle cable lock with 4-digit combination 12x800mm
description.long_desc:
4-Digit Combination Bike Lock: Safety and Convenience Combined!


If you’re looking for a reliable security solution for your bike, our 4-digit combination bike lock is the perfect choice.


Here’s why:



  • Security: Our lock features a 4-digit PIN code, allowing you to personalize the combination. No need to worry about keys—simply input the correct code to unlock.

  • Durability: The 12 mm thick steel cable provides robust protection against theft. Whether you’re leaving your bike momentarily or overnight, you can trust that your bike is secure.

  • Ease of Use: No need to carry keys. Just remember your 4-digit code to open the lock.

  • Weather Protection: The steel cable is covered with a rubber shield, safeguarding it from rain, snow, and moisture. You won’t have to worry about corrosion or damage in challenging weather conditions.


Technical Specifications:


Material: Steel, synthetic material


Lock Cable Thickness: 12 mm


Lock Cable Length: 1200 mm


Lock Type: 4-digit combination

description.name: Bicycle cable lock with keys 12x800mm
description.long_desc:
Bicycle lock with a key is a reliable companion for every cyclist. This type of lock is not only a practical tool but also a guarantee of peace of mind and security for your bike.


Here’s why you should choose this product:




  • Safety and Durability: The 12 mm thick steel cable with a length of 80 cm provides robust protection against theft. Whether you’re leaving your bike for a moment or overnight, you can be confident that your bike is secure.




  • Keyed Lock: Two keys are included in the set, allowing convenient use. No worries about forgetting a password or code – simply insert the key and unlock the mechanism.




  • Weather Protection: The steel cable is covered with a rubber shield, safeguarding it from rain, snow, and moisture. You won’t have to fret about corrosion or damage in challenging weather conditions.




  • Lock Cylinder Cover: Additionally, the lock features a cylinder cover that shields it from dirt. This is especially important when using the bike in off-road or urban environments where dust, mud, and other contaminants could affect the lock’s functionality.




Technical Specifications:


Material: Steel, synthetic material


Cable Thickness: 12 mm


Cable Length: 800 mm


Lock Type: Keyed


Number of Keys in the Set: 2

  • Weather Protection: The steel cable is covered with a rubber shield, safeguarding it from rain, snow, and moisture. You won’t have to fret about corrosion or damage in challenging weather conditions.




  • Lock Cylinder Cover: Additionally, the lock features a cylinder cover that shields it from dirt. This is especially important when using the bike in off-road or urban environments where dust, mud, and other contaminants could affect the lock’s functionality.




Technical Specifications:


Material: Steel, synthetic material


Cable Thickness: 12 mm


Cable Length: 800 mm


Lock Type: Keyed


Number of Keys in the Set: 2

description.name: Bicycle chain lock 6/900mm
description.long_desc:
Key-operated chain bike lock - Your safety within reach!


If you're looking for a reliable security solution for your bike, then our bike lock is the perfect choice. A chain lock is not only a practical tool but also a guarantee of peace of mind and safety for your bike.


Here's why you should choose this product:



  • 90 cm chain length: The chain is long enough to allow you to secure your bike to various objects such as bike racks, fences, or railings. You don't have to worry about a lack of space!

  • 6 mm link diameter: Solid links provide strength and resistance to cutting attempts. Your bike will be secure even in high-risk theft areas.

  • Nylon chain cover: Our chain is covered with nylon, protecting it from damage and also preventing the bike from being scratched by the chain.

  • Lock cover: Additional lock cover protects against dust, sand, and moisture. The key will operate smoothly, and the lock will not malfunction.

  • Two keys included: You don't have to worry about losing the key! We provide two keys so you can keep one as a spare.


Technical specifications:


Material: steel, plastic, nylon


Length of securing chain: 900 mm


Chain link diameter: 6 mm


Lock type: key-operated


Number of keys: 2

description.name: Pack of 2 pcs bi-metal metal cutting blades 300x12.5mm 24T
description.long_desc:
BI-METAL Saw Blade for Metal - This is a product that will revolutionize your metal cutting experiences. Offering a length of 300mm and a width of 12.5mm, this saw blade is designed to deliver precise and clean cuts every time. The saw blade is a BI-METAL product consisting of two different metals combined together, allowing for the best features of both metals, leading to better performance and durability of the product. In the case of metal saw blades, like this one, it allows for the creation of blades that are harder and cut better, while at the same time being less brittle and more resistant to cracking and breaking. With 24 teeth per inch on the saw blade, you can be sure that every cut will be smooth and effortless. Additionally, each package contains 2 pieces, ensuring long-lasting use.

description.name: CrV bolt cutters 210mm
description.long_desc:
Geko brand shears designed for cutting steel wire are an indispensable tool in construction, industry, and craftsmanship. With a solid construction and high-quality materials, they ensure precise and efficient cutting of wire up to 3.5 mm thick.



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: Chrome-vanadium steel

  • Spring mechanism: Built-in for easier operation

  • Operation: One-handed

  • Handle: Dual-component, contoured, anti-slip, ensuring a comfortable grip and ease of use

  • Max. wire thickness: 3.5 mm

  • Size: 210 mm

description.name: Segmented Diamond blade 350x25,4/20x12mm
description.long_desc:
Profesjonalna tarcza diamentowa marki Tvardy. Tarcza o profilu SEGMENTOWYM przeznaczona jest do cięcia materiałów budowlanych takich jak: beton, żelbeton, cegła, kamień murowany, chodnik, dachówka, marmur, granit, piaskowiec, asfalt. Tarcza diamentowa o średnicy 350mm i grubości 2,2mm. Posiada nasyp diamentowy o wysokości 12mm oraz grubości 3,2mm.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • profesjonalna tarcza diamentowa o wysokiej koncentracji diamentu, zapewnia szybkie i wydajne cięcie

  • nasyp diamentowy o wysokości 12mm i grubości 3,2mm

  • tarcza o średnicy 350mm i otworze montażowym 25,4mm (w zestawie redukcja na 20mm) doskonale sprawdzi się podczas pracy z przecinarką spalinową 

  • przeznaczona do cięcia takich materiałów jak: beton, żelbeton, cegła, kamień murowany, chodnik, dachówka, marmur, granit, piaskowiec, asfalt

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Marka: Tvardy

Średnica: 350 mm

Otwór montażowy: 25,4/20 mm

Profil tarczy: Segment

Wysokość nasypu: 12 mm

Grubość diamentu: 3,2 mm

Grubość tarczy: 2,2 mm

Maksymalna prędkość obrotowa: 5 500 obr./min

description.name: 3in1 barbecue grill brush with scraper and sponge
description.long_desc:
Thanks to the 3-in-1 design, this brush enables comprehensive removal of contaminants from the grill surface, ensuring cleanliness and hygiene during every grilling session.


Product characteristics:



  • 3-in-1 design: With the combination of sponge, wire brush, and straight scraper, you can quickly and effectively remove even the toughest stains and remnants of burnt food from the grill surface or grate.

description.name: LED floodlight 2x100W with a telescopic construction tripod – cold white color 6500K
description.long_desc:
Naświetlacz 2xLED SMD 100W ze statywem budowlanym i kablem to wyjątkowe oświetlenie robocze, które łączy w sobie efektywność oraz wygodę użytkowania.


Zastosowanie 2x144 diod LED SMD o niskiej emisji ciepła zapewnia wysoką jasność i efektywność przy minimalnym zużyciu energii. Barwa emitowanego światła to 6500K, co odpowiada białej zimnej barwie. Jest to idealne rozwiązanie do pracy przy wykończeniach wnętrz, doskonale uwydatniające szczegóły, takie jak niedoskonałości na obrabianych ścianach.

Teleskopowy statyw budowlany to solidne i wszechstronne rozwiązanie, doskonałe do oświetlania dużych przestrzeni na budowie. Wykonany z trwałego metalu, zapewnia stabilność i komfort użytkowania.
Statyw oferuje regulację wysokości od 60 cm do maksymalnie 160 cm, co umożliwia dostosowanie do różnych potrzeb oświetleniowych. Dzięki wygodnym, płynnie działającym pokrętłom z tworzywa sztucznego, regulacja wysokości jest szybka i intuicyjna.


Charakterystyka produktu:



  • Mocna, nienagrzewająca się lampa LED,

  • Jasna barwa światła - biała zimna

  • Regulacja kąta nachylenia

  • Kąt padania światła: 120°

  • Solidny, regulowany statyw teleskopowy

  • Statyw posiada miejsce na zwinięty kabel

  • Płynnie działające pokrętła regulujące wysokość

  • Statyw osadzony na 3 nóżkach


Specyfikacja techniczna:



  • Moc pojedynczej lampy: 100W

  • Kąt świecenia: 120°

  • Rodzaj ramy: regulowana

  • Materiał: metal, szkło hartowane

  • Rodzaj lampy: 2x LED SMD (x144)

  • Barwa: 6500K - biała zimna

  • Moc światła: 2x 10 000 lm

  • Wymiary soczewki: 22,5 x 15,5 cm

  • Maksymalna wysokość statywu: 160 cm

  • Minimalna wysokość statywu: 60 cm

  • Maksymalny rozstaw nóg: 80 cm

  • Długość kabla: 1,5 m

  • Klasa energetyczna: E

  • Współczynnik oddawania barw: Ra>80

  • Stopień ochrony: IP66

description.name: LED floodlight 2x100W with a telescopic construction tripod – neutral white color 4500K
description.long_desc:
2xLED SMD 100W Floodlight with Construction Stand and Cable is an excellent work light that combines efficiency and convenience.


The use of 2x144 SMD LED diodes with low heat emission guarantees high brightness and performance with minimal energy consumption. The light emitted is 4500K, corresponding to a neutral white color. This light color is gentle on the eyes and is perfect for long working hours.

The telescopic construction stand is a solid and versatile solution, ideal for illuminating large areas on construction sites. Made from durable metal, it provides ease of use and stability.
The stand offers height adjustment from 60 cm to a maximum of 160 cm, allowing for adaptation to various lighting needs. With convenient, smoothly operating plastic knobs, adjustment is quick and intuitive.


Product Features:



  • Powerful non-heating LED lamp,

  • Bright light color - neutral white

  • Adjustable tilt angle

  • Light angle: 120°

  • Solid adjustable telescopic stand

  • The stand has a place for holding the coiled cable

  • Smooth-operating knobs for height adjustment

  • Stand mounted on 3 legs


Technical Specifications:



  • Power per lamp: 100W

  • Lighting angle: 120°

  • Frame type: adjustable

  • Material: metal, tempered glass

  • Lamp type: 2x LED SMD (x144)

  • Color temperature: 4500K - neutral white

  • Luminous flux: 2x 10,000 lm

  • Lens dimensions: 22.5 x 15.5 cm

  • Maximum stand height: 160 cm

  • Minimum stand height: 60 cm

  • Maximum leg spread: 80 cm

  • Cable length: 1.5m

  • Energy class: E

  • Color rendering index: Ra>80

  • Protection rating: IP66

description.name: LED floodlight 100W with a telescopic construction tripod – cold white color 6500K
description.long_desc:
LED SMD 100W Floodlight with Construction Stand and Cable is an excellent work light that combines efficiency and convenience.


The use of 144 SMD LED diodes with low heat emission ensures optimal brightness and performance with minimal energy consumption. The emitted light color is 6500K, corresponding to a cold white tone. This light color is ideal for interior finishing work, highlighting imperfections on treated walls.

The telescopic construction stand is a solid and versatile solution, perfect for illuminating large areas on construction sites. Made from durable metal, it provides ease of use and stability.
The stand offers height adjustment from 60 cm to a maximum of 160 cm, allowing it to adapt to various lighting needs. Thanks to convenient, smoothly operating plastic knobs, the adjustment is quick and intuitive.


Product features:



  • Powerful non-heating LED lamp,

  • Bright light color - cold white

  • Adjustable tilt angle

  • Light angle: 120°

  • Solid adjustable telescopic stand

  • The stand has a place for holding the coiled cable

  • Smooth-operating knobs for height adjustment

  • Stand mounted on 3 legs


Technical specifications:



  • Power: 100W

  • Lighting angle: 120°

  • Frame type: adjustable

  • Material: metal, tempered glass

  • Lamp type: SMD LED (x144)

  • Color temperature: 6500K - cold white

  • Luminous flux: 10,000 lm

  • Lens dimensions: 22.5 x 15.5 cm

  • Maximum stand height: 160 cm

  • Minimum stand height: 60 cm

  • Maximum leg spread: 80 cm

  • Cable length: 1.5m

  • Energy class: E

  • Color rendering index: Ra>80
